jawaharlal neru agamathiwaraya sar jon kothalawala ee atharin ragena agamathiwarayata paudgalikawa pirinamu sarwagnya dhathu kipayak shri lankika pawulak sathuwa thibena bawata thorathuru atha. 1898 wasare pep kanim kala sthanaya asalin 1972 warshaye di sarwagnya dhathu 20 k sahitha bandunak da soya gena atha.1978 wasare kapilawasthu sarwagnya dhathu wanda puda ganimata bauddhayanta wasanawa udawiya. 2011 wasarata elambaena 2600 shri sambuddhathwa jayanthiya wenuwen nawathath ee dhathun wahansela wadama karawana lesa yojanawak rajayata idiripath kara atha.
